IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE HEALTH AND WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE HEALTH AND WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED MEDICAL, HOSPITAL, LIFE, VISION, PRESCRIPTION DRUGS, DENTAL AND OTHER BENEFITS TO ACTIVE AND RETIREE PARTICIPANTS.

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: ESTIMATED LIABILITY FOR MEDICAL, HOSPITAL, VISION PLAN AND DENTAL CLAIMS
ESTIMATED LIABILITY UNDER GROUP INSURANCE CONTRACTS
ESTIMATED FUTURE BENEFITS BASED ON PARTICIPANTS' HOUR BANK PLAN

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PLAN'S ADMINISTRATOR HAS ANALYZED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE PLAN AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT, AS OF MAY 31, 2018, THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN POSITIONS TAKEN, OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN, THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE PLAN IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY THE TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. THE PLAN'S ADMINISTRATOR BELIEVES IT IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS FOR THE FISCAL YEARS PRIOR TO 2015.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS CONTRACTED WITH THE IRONWORKERS EMPLOYEES' BENEFIT CORPORATION, INC. (IEBC), TO PROVIDE ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES FOR THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A COMMITTEE WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE IEBC BEFORE FILING THE FORM 990 WITH THE IRS AND AFTER APPROVAL OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY COVERS ALL TRUSTEES OF THE PLAN. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES HAS DISCRETIONARY AUTHORITY TO DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS AND TO VOTE ON THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION OR AGREEMENT. SUCH DETERMINATIONS ARE MADE WITHOUT THE INPUT OR PARTICIPATION OF THE CONFLICTED INDIVIDUAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATIONAL DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL INFORMATION, AND THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE BY APPOINTMENT AT THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S OFFICE.

TRUSTEES ARE NOT COMPENSATED BY THE TRUST. COMPENSATION PAID TO TRUSTEES EMPLOYED BY OTHER RELATED ORGANIZATIONS IS REPORTED ON THE FORM 990 FILED WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE BY THE RELATED TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION. IF YOU WOULD LIKE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, PLEASE CONTACT THE TRUST OFFICE.
THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE ANNUAL AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN THIS PROCESS FROM PRIOR YEAR.
THE TRUST HAS NO EMPLOYEES. THE TRUST ISSUED W-2'S TO PARTICIPANTS THAT RECEIVED DISABILITY BENEFITS DURING 2017.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO PROVIDE PENSION BENEFITS TO IRONWORKERS PARTICIPANTS

TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE UPON RETIREMENT.

TransactionsRelatedOrgGrp.MethodOfAmountDeterminationTxt: BASED ON A COST ALLOCATION STUDY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE R, IDENTIFICATION OF RELATED ORGANIZATIONS:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FILING ORGANIZATION IS A HEALTH AND WELFARE PLAN THAT PROVIDES HEALTH AND WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE EMPLOYEES AND THEIR DEPENDENTS. AS OF MAY 31, 2018, THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 541 EMPLOYERS THAT CONTRIBUTE TO THE TRUST. THE ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE MAINTAINS A DATABASE OF THESE CONTRIBUTING EMPLOYERS, INCLUDING NAMES, ADDRESSES AND OTHER CONTACT INFORMATION. THE FEDERAL TAX CLASSIFICATION (DISREGARDED ENTITY, TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION, PARTNERSHIP, TAXABLE ORPORATION OR TRUST) FOR EACH CONTRIBUTING EMPLOYER IS NOT ON FILE WITH THE ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE AND IT COULD NOT BE REASONABLY OBTAINED. AS A RESULT THE NAMES OF THE CONTRIBUTING EMPLOYERS ARE LISTED ON THE VII BELOW AND NOT ON PARTS II THROUGH IV BY FEDERAL TAX CLASSIFICATION. A & R WELDING INC A.A.
